data.title: Matthew Perry & Matt LeBlanc In TV Love Triangle
data.meta_description: Matthew Perry and Matt LeBlanc are more than just friends, thanks to a love triangle created by their new TV comedies. The girl in the middle? Andrea Anders,
data.text:
Matthew Perry and Matt LeBlanc are more than just friends, thanks to a love triangle created by their new TV comedies. The girl in the middle? Andrea Anders, RadarOnline.com has learned.

Perry is starring in the sitcom Mr. Sunshine, premiering on ABC Feb. 9. His love interest in the comedy is Andrea. She just happens to be Matt LeBlanc's real-life girlfriend, reports Us magazine. And she does double duty with LeBlanc, also playing his girlfriend on his new Showtime series, Episodes.
